/** * Common font characteristics and methods. * Declared abstract only so that it can't be instanciated. * Users have to call 'new awPHPFont' or 'new awFileFont', * or any of their inherited classes (awFont1, awTuffy, awTTFFont, etc.) * * @package Artichow */
/** * Build the font * */
/** * Draw a text * * @param awDriver $driver * @param awPoint $p Draw text at this point * @param awText $text The text * @param int $width Text box width */

/** * Common font characteristics and methods. * Declared abstract only so that it can't be instanciated. * Users have to call 'new awPHPFont' or 'new awFileFont', * or any of their inherited classes (awFont1, awTuffy, awTTFFont, etc.) * * @package Artichow */
/** * Class for fonts that cannot be transformed, * like the built-in PHP fonts for example. * * @package Artichow */
/** * The used font identifier * * @var int */
/** * Class for fonts that cannot be transformed, * like the built-in PHP fonts for example. * * @package Artichow */
/** * Class for fonts that can be transformed (rotated, skewed, etc.), * like TTF or FDB fonts for example. * * @package Artichow */
/** * The name of the font, without the extension * * @var string */
/** * The size of the font * * @var int */
/** * The font filename extension * * @var string */

/** * Set the name of the font. The $name variable can contain the full path, * or just the filename. Artichow will try to do The Right Thing, * as well as set the extension property correctly if possible. * * @param string $name */
// Path is not absolute, use ARTICHOW_FONT
// Path is not absolute, use ARTICHOW_FONT
/** * Return the name of the font, i.e. the absolute path and the filename, without the extension. * * @return string */
/** * Set the size of the font, in pixels * * @param int $size */
/** * Return the size of the font, in pixels * * @return int */
/** * Set the extension, without the dot * * @param string $extension */
/** * Get the filename extension for that font * * @return string */
/** * Class for fonts that can be transformed (rotated, skewed, etc.), * like TTF or FDB fonts for example. * * @package Artichow */
/** * Class representing TTF fonts * * @package Artichow */
/** * Class representing TTF fonts * * @package Artichow */
